thread.title: Happy Brexit Day! Memes from unhappy Remainers flood the internet as Theresa May triggers Article 50
thread.title_full: Happy Brexit Day! Memes from unhappy Remainers flood the internet as Theresa May triggers Article 50

author: Dan Bloom
title: Happy Brexit Day! Memes from unhappy Remainers flood the internet as Theresa May triggers Article 50
text:
News Happy Brexit Day! Memes from unhappy Remainers flood the internet as Theresa May triggers Article 50 Just before lunch a man with a big beard will hand in a letter that triggers Brexit - and as #BrexitDay trends on Twitter, the 48% are NOT happy Share Anti-Brexit protesters outside Parliament today - dressed as Theresa May (Photo: REUTERS) Share Get politics updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Happy Article 50 Day! 
Just before lunch a man with a big beard will hand in a letter to an office in Brussels that will kick-start Britain's exit from the EU. 
And an awful lot of people aren't very happy about it. 
#BrexitDay is of course trending on Twitter, which has a pretty strong contingent of Remainers. 
The 48% have posted pictures of fire and of people causing themselves injuries. 
Here are some of the funniest reactions so far. Read More
